title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects in the Navigator, the Open/Close project options are not consistently available.
EB: Either both Open/Close project options should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the Navigator. 
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects. 
3. Observe the availability of the Open/Close project options.
